BEAST2_XSEDE
infile_ - Primary Input File
runtime_ - Float - Maximum Hours to Run (up to 168 hours)
is_partitioned_ - Switch - My data set is partitioned
nu_partitions_ - Integer - How many partitions does your data have?
no_beagle_ - Switch - Do not use Beagle
spec_seed_ - Switch - Specify a seed for this run (by default a random seed is used)
seed_val_ - Integer - Enter the seed value here
